title: Party Leaders to discuss 21A
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A special meeting of party leaders is scheduled to be held on Thursday (21) afternoon under the chairmanship of Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena.
It is reported that the 21st Amendment to the Constitution will be discussed.
News 1st Parliamentary Correspondents said that a draft of the 21st Amendment will also be handed over to the Speaker today.
Meanwhile, it is reported that the Samagi Jana Balawega is scheduled to submit a no-confidence motion against the Government to the Speaker during Friday’s (22) session.
